argSrc: There should be a higher fine for dog dirt on the pavement.
argTrg: Dog dirt is disgusting and a hygiene problem.

argSrc: There should be a higher fine for dog dirt on the pavement.
argTrg: Also children, adults and other animals aren't allowed to leave droppings on the pavement.

argTrg: If you dispose of the waste then and there yourself, no fine is necessary.
